title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Small business development (EP 60029) Operation of the small business: accounting, finance, production, and marketing subsystems, use of analytical approach for problems of manpower, IPR, supply management, delivery linkages, networking management. Special emphasis on fund raising strategies from small business financial resources.
